string.value: You've passed all of #p2101011#'s tests. Right? Hm, maybe you should talk it over with #b#p2101011##k.
#p2101011# needs you to fork over #b10000 mesos#k to help the Sand Bandits give aid to the people of #m260000000#. He says a selflessness is a key trait for a Sand Bandit.

It took you a while to gather the money, but you finally donated 10,000 mesos to the residents of #m260000000#. Now you've passed all of Sejan's tests! But you're not done yet. The secret wall mentioned a bow, yes, but it also mentioned arrows, an iron hammer, and a dagger.
모래그림단원에게 필요한 덕목은 많아. 하지만 무엇보다 중요한 건 욕심이 없어야 한다는 것이지. 모래그림단원은 왕비의 값비싼 재물을 훔치곤 하지만, 그건 단을 위해서가 아니라 #m260000000# 사람들을 위해서 훔치는 것.
욕심이 많은 자는 그들의 탐욕을 참지 못하고 사람들을 위한 재물에 손을 대고 말지. 모래그림단원은 절대 그런 짓을 해서는 안 돼. 그러니 이번 시험에서는 당신이 얼마나 욕심이 없는지 시험해 보겠어.
시험 방법은 간단해. 지금까지 당신이 모은 #b10000 메소#k를 내놓으면 되니까. 너무 많다고? 하지만 #m260000000#를 왕비의 손에서 구하려면 그보다 훨씬 더 큰 메소가 필요해. 당신이 욕심 없이 10000메소를 줄 수 있다면, 당신을 믿겠어.
지금까지 잘해 주었는데 여기서 멈추는 건가? 하긴... 메소에 대한 욕망을 버리는 건 쉽지 않은 일이지.
One of the most important qualities of a Sand Bandit is selflessness. True, Sand Bandits steal riches from the queen, but it's not for us. It's for the people of #m260000000#.
A selfish individual cannot contain his greed. He will inevitably want to keep the expensive items for himself. This is taboo for a Sand Bandit. Thus, I must test how selfless you really are

It's simple. I need you to donate #b10,000 mesos#k. Too much? Think about it, we'll need much more than that to save #m260000000# from the queen. Selflessly part with 10,000 mesos, and I will believe in you.
You've done well so far. Don't falter now... Then again, it is hard to let go of mesos…
You've decided to donate 10,000 mesos? I am sure there was much you could have bought with that money, yet you selflessly sacrificed it for the people of #m260000000#. That's commendable.
Then you have passed the tests that I, #p2101011#, have for you. Now you just have to earn the trust of the other Sand Bandits hidden around town. Keep at it.
That's not enough. #b10,000 mesos#k shouldn't be hard to obtain.
